meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These regulations may be cited as the Land (Miscellaneous Provisions) Regulations.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Fees for licences in Hong Kong, Kowloon and New Kowloon

subsection.content: The fee payable for a licence to occupy Government land in an area specified in column 2 of Part I of Schedule 1, for a purpose not specified in column 2 of Part II of that Schedule, shall be that specified in column 3 of Part I of that Schedule (hereinafter referred to as the urban area standard rate).
The fee payable for a licence to occupy Government land for a purpose specified in column 2 of Part II of Schedule 1, shall be that specified in column 3 of Part II of that Schedule.

Except in the case of a licence to occupy Government land for the purpose mentioned in item 7, 15, 18 or 19 of Part II of Schedule 1 or as otherwise provided, the minimum fee for a licence to occupy Government land in Hong Kong, Kowloon and New Kowloon shall be $10. (L.N. 33 of 1974)
For the purpose of item 1 of Part II of Schedule 1 the decision of the Authority as to whether other cultivation is 1st Class or 2nd Class shall be final.
For the purpose of item 9 of Part II of Schedule 1, the decision of the Authority as to whether any land will be or is being used for non-profit-making, charitable or welfare purposes shall be final.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Fees for licences in the New Territories

subsection.content: The fee payable for a licence to occupy Government land in the New Territories (excluding New Kowloon) for a purpose not specified in column 2 of Part II of Schedule 2, shall be that specified in Part I of that Schedule (hereinafter referred to as the New Territories standard rate).

The fee payable for a licence to occupy Government land in the New Territories (excluding New Kowloon) for a purpose specified in column 2 of Part II of Schedule 2, shall be that specified in column 3 of Part II of that Schedule.

Except in the case of a licence to occupy Government land for the purpose mentioned in item 6, 9, 14, 17 or 18 of Part II of Schedule 2 or as otherwise provided, the minimum fee for a licence to occupy Government land in the New Territories shall be $5. (L.N. 33 of 1974)
For the purpose of item 9 of Part II of Schedule 2, the decision of the Authority as to whether any land will be or is being used for non-profit-making, charitable or welfare purposes shall be final.

section.name: s3A
section.heading: Fees relating to excavation permits or emergency excavation permits

subsection.leadIn: The fee payable for the issue under section 10A(1) of the Ordinance of, or extension under section 10A(3) or 10D(4) of the Ordinance in respect of, an excavation permit shall be—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: where the permit relates to an excavation in unleased land which is a street maintained by the Highways Department, that specified in column 3 of Part I of Schedule 3 against the applicable description in column 2 of that Part;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: where the permit relates to an excavation in unleased land, other than any street maintained by the Highways Department, that specified in column 3 of Part II of Schedule 3 against the applicable description in column 2 of that Part.

subsection.content: The fee payable for an emergency excavation made or maintained during the initial period referred to in section 10C(4) of the Ordinance shall be that specified in column 3 of Part III of Schedule 3 against the applicable description in column 2 of that Part.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Duplicate licences
section.content: The Authority may, if satisfied that a licence issued under the Ordinance has been lost or destroyed, issue a duplicate thereof upon payment of a fee of $5.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Calculation of fees
section.leadIn: If a fee payable under these regulations includes—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a number of cents less than 50, the number of cents shall be disregarded;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: 50 or more cents, such number of cents shall be regarded as one extra dollar.

subsection.content: The boundaries of any district specified in any Schedule shall be those shown on a map signed by the Director of Lands and lodged in the Lands Department. (L.N. 94 of 1986; L.N. 291 of 1993)
Any such map may be inspected free of charge during office hours by any person.

schedule.name: sch3
schedule.heading: Fees

heading.inline: Fees Payable in respect of Excavation
Unleased Land which is a Street

tr.td: Issue or deemed issue of an excavation permit referred to in sections 10A(1) and 10D(2) of the Ordinance
$2,830 plus a daily fee of $46 per day for the whole duration of the excavation permit
Extension in respect of an excavation permit referred to in sections 10A(3) and 10D(4) of the Ordinance

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: $825 plus a daily fee of $46 per day for the whole duration of the extended period; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: economic costs in the following scale for the whole duration of the extended period—

subparagraph.content: $29,200 per day for a strategic street;
$11,330 per day for a sensitive street;
$2,310 per day for a remaining street.

heading.inline: Fees Payable in respect of Excavation

tr.td: Issue of an excavation permit referred to in section 10A(1) of the Ordinance
Extension in respect of an excavation permit referred to in section 10A(3) of the Ordinance

heading.inline: Fees Payable in respect of Emergency
Excavations in Unleased Land which is

tr.td: Emergency excavation made or maintained during the initial period referred to in section 10C(4) of the Ordinance
$2,830 plus a daily fee of $46 per day for the whole duration of the emergency excavation determined in accordance with section 10C(5) of the Ordinance

schedule.sourceNote: (Schedule 3 added 17 of 2003 s. 14. Amended L.N. 5 of 2015; L.N. 205 of 2018; L.N. 66 of 2025)
